actions.name: Arbiter's Touch
entries: {@atk ms} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Judgement
entries: Koh Tam judges a creature within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 50 (10d8 + 5 damage) radiant damage. If the target had fewer hit points than their maximum prior to this attack, the creature takes 70 (10d12 + 5 damage) radiant damage instead.

actions.name: Arbiter's Light {@recharge 4}
entries: Ranged Spell atk +9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 70 (10d12 + 5 damage) radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition blinded} condition until the start of Koh Tam's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Koh Tam casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):
